programme.title: Vicky Cristina Barcelona
programme.desc: Romantic comedy-drama about a pair of American friends (Scarlett Johansson and Rebecca Hall) who vacation together in Spain and fall under the romantic spell of Juan, a passionate artist (Javier Bardem).(n)

programme.title: Rebel in the Rye
programme.desc: Set amidst the colorful backdrop of mid-20th century New York City, this film follows a young J.D. Salinger (Nicholas Hoult) as he struggles to find his voice, pursues a love affair with famed socialite Oona O'Neill (Zoey Deutch) and fights on the frontlines of World War II. It's these experiences that inform the creation of his masterpiece, The Catcher in the Rye, bringing him overnight fame (and notoriety) and leading him to withdraw from the public eye for the rest of his life.(n)

programme.title: The Killer Inside Me
programme.desc: A deputy sheriff (Casey Affleck) in a small West Texas town of the 1950's tries with increasing desperation to hide his tortured, sadomasochistic affair with a prostitute (Jessica Alba), as well as the fact that he is a serial killer. Kate Hudson costars in this gritty, hard-boiled drama.(n)

programme.title: American Satan
programme.desc: Hellbent on following in the footsteps of their music idols, a young rock band moves to Los Angeles to chase their dreams of stardom on the Sunset Strip. When they meet an enigmatic stranger who seems to know them better than they know themselves, he preys on their most basic desires and emotions. He entices them with an offer that sets them on a path to fame and fortune. But when their debut album, AMERICAN SATAN, is released, it sets off a firestorm of controversy, death, and destruction beyond anything the music world could ever imagine.(n)

programme.title: Wolves
programme.desc: Anthony (Taylor John Smith) is a standout player on his high school's basketball team with everything going for him: a killer three-point shot, a loving girlfriend (Zazie Beetz) and a chance at a scholarship to Cornell. But Anthony's dreams of playing college ball are jeopardized by his volatile father (Michael Shannon), a hard-drinking writer whose compulsive gambling threatens to derail the lives of both his wife (Carla Gugino) and son. Anthony must summon the strength to step out from his father's shadow and reclaim his future.(n)

programme.title: When Cary Grant Introduced Timothy Leary to LSD
programme.desc: Cary Grant (BEN CHAPLIN) sits in his plush dressing room at Culver Studios, California, waiting to be called to set by his director, Alfred Hitchcock. Suddenly he gets a visitor, Dr. Timothy Leary (AIDEN GILLEN). Having read about Grant's dabbling with LSD in an interview with Good Housekeeping Magazine, Leary is keen to try the magical new drug. Grant however, is insistent that the powerful substance only be taken under medical supervision. Together, the men explore past, present and future memories.(n)

programme.title: The Legend of Ben Hall
programme.desc: Focusing on the last nine months of Hall's life, when he's a well-established bushranger along with his accomplices, the film explores the relationships within the gang, their robberies and the details surrounding Hall's betrayal and controversial death at the hands of the police on May 5th, 1865. Starring Jack Martin.(n)

programme.title: Wakefield
programme.desc: Successful suburbanite commuter Howard Wakefield (Bryan Cranston) takes a perverse detour from family life by vanishing without a trace. Hidden in the attic of his carriage house garage and surviving by scavenging at night, Howard secretly observes the lives of his wife (Jennifer Garner) and children and neighbors. He slowly realizes that he has not left his family, he has left himself.(n)

programme.title: Jurassic Park
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Steven Spielberg directs this vision of a theme park featuring genetically-engineered dinosaurs. Who will survive when the dinosaurs run amok? Academy Award winner Richard Attenborough stars as misguided tycoon, John Hammond. Sam Neill and Academy Award nominees Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum, and Samuel L. Jackson also star as the experts brought in to analyze the nuances of the new park.(n)

programme.title: Cell
programme.desc: At the Boston airport, Clay (John Cusack) witnesses a scene of chaotic mayhem when an electronic signal turns hundreds of cell phone users into rabid killers. Desperate to find his estranged wife and son, Clay teams with a train driver (Samuel L. Jackson) to battle the horde of murderous phoners as the city descends into madness.(n)

programme.title: Push (2009)
programme.desc: A clairvoyant teenager (Dakota Fanning) and a telekinetic fugitive (Chris Evans) team up to find a missing woman who is the key to exposing a sinister, secret government agency that's building a clandestine army of psychic warriors. Djimon Hounsou costars in this sci-fi action thriller.(n)

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: Eight strangers with eight different points of view try to unlock the truth behind an assassination attempt on the president of the United States. Thomas Barnes (Dennis Quaid) and Kent Taylor (Mathew Fox) are two Secret Service agents assigned to protect President Ashton (William Hurt) at a landmark summit on the global war on terror. When President Ashton is shot moments after his arrival in Spain, chaos ensues and disparate lives collide in the hunt for the assassin.(n)

programme.title: Love Means Zero
programme.desc: At 85 years old, Nick Bollettieri is a living legend. At his tennis academy in Florida, he raised a generation of champions. Courier. Seles. Agassi. No other coach has matched his success, his dominance or his fame. His greatness, though, came at a terrible price - broken marriages, financial ruin and a fractured relationship with his surrogate son and most cherished student, Andre Agassi. This documentary tells his story and explores the cost of his all-consuming drive for greatness. Directed and produced by Jason Kohn.(n)

programme.title: ShoBox: The New Generation: 4/14/2017 (R)
programme.desc: The critically acclaimed SHOWTIME boxing series, "ShoBox: The New Generation" returns with a slate of undefeated prospects determined to fight for a world title, featuring light heavyweight Dmitry Bivol (9-0, 7 KOs) and welterweight Juan Ruiz (18-0, 11 KOs) in separate bouts.(n)

programme.title: Lawless Range
programme.desc: Brothers Sean and Tommy Donnelly live and work in modern day Texas. Tommy has always been troubled and Sean has always been there to help him but when Tommy gets himself into debt there's not much Sean can do. The money is owed to some very dangerous people and neither Sean nor Tommy has a spare dime. At every turn, Tommy manages to find a way to exacerbate their already difficult position. The situation escalates to the point where Sean is faced with a decision: stand by his brother or give up on him once and for all.(n)

programme.title: Halloween II (2009)
programme.desc: It's nearly Halloween again and the terrorized Laurie Strode awaits the dreaded return of her murderous brother Michael in this sequel remake starring Scout Taylor-Compton, Malcolm McDowell and Taylor Mane.(n)

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A group of friends venture deep into the streets of New York on a rescue mission during a rampaging monster attack.(n)

programme.title: Walking Out
programme.desc: Once a year, fourteen-year-old David (Josh Wiggins) travels from his mother's home in Texas to visit his loner father, Cal (Matt Bomer), in the remote mountains of Montana. There, the two embark on their annual hunting excursion, during which the taciturn Cal attempts to connect with his smartphone-addicted son. But when a terrifying turn of events leaves Cal critically wounded, it's up to the teenage David to summon enough strength for both of them.(n)

programme.title: Dudes & Dragons
programme.desc: When a powerful wizard is jilted by a princess, he vows to rid the land of love and commands a fire breathing dragon to destroy any sign of affection seen throughout the kingdom but as the death toll rises, a brave and arrogant warrior and his estranged brother answer the princess’ call to fight the curse.(n)

programme.title: Max Steel
programme.desc: Teenager Max McGrath moves back to Copper Canyon, the town where his scientist father died under mysterious circumstances. Adjusting to a new school is not easy for Max, and it becomes even more complicated when his body starts to generate strange energy flare-ups that he can't control. This unpredictable power surge grows too intense for Max to handle and he is forced to distance himself from those around him. On the brink of fatal combustion, Max is rescued by Steel, an extraterrestrial who has been secretly monitoring his progress.(n)

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: Eight strangers with eight different points of view try to unlock the truth behind an assassination attempt on the president of the United States. Thomas Barnes (Dennis Quaid) and Kent Taylor (Mathew Fox) are two Secret Service agents assigned to protect President Ashton (William Hurt) at a landmark summit on the global war on terror. When President Ashton is shot moments after his arrival in Spain, chaos ensues and disparate lives collide in the hunt for the assassin.(n)

programme.title: The Good Shepherd
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Robert De Niro directs this story of a young CIA agent during the Cold War whose dedication to work costs him his innocence and his soul. Academy Award winners Matt Damon and Angelina Jolie also star.(n)

programme.title: Assault on Precinct 13
programme.desc: Isolated and cut off from the city inside a soon-to-be-closed L.A. police station, a group of police officers and convicts join forces to defend themselves against a gang who wants to kill someone trapped inside the precinct.(n)

programme.title: G.I. Jane
programme.desc: Demi Moore stars as gutsy Lieutenant O'Neil, the first woman ever given the opportunity to earn a place in the armed forces most highly skilled combat unit - the elite Navy SEALS. But the already brutal rigors of training camp turn into an unimaginable test of courage and determination once it becomes clear that no one - not powerful politicians, top military brass, or her male Navy SEAL teammates - wants her to succeed!(n)

programme.title: The Gunman
programme.desc: Sean Penn stars as Jim Terrier, an ex-special forces government contractor who is betrayed by the organization he once worked for and must go on the run in a relentless game of cat and mouse across Africa and Europe.(n)

programme.title: Vantage Point
programme.desc: Eight strangers with eight different points of view try to unlock the truth behind an assassination attempt on the president of the United States. Thomas Barnes (Dennis Quaid) and Kent Taylor (Mathew Fox) are two Secret Service agents assigned to protect President Ashton (William Hurt) at a landmark summit on the global war on terror. When President Ashton is shot moments after his arrival in Spain, chaos ensues and disparate lives collide in the hunt for the assassin.(n)

programme.title: Bad Ass
programme.desc: A shunned Vietnam veteran who becomes a local hero after saving a man from attackers on a city bus decides to take action when his best friend is murdered and the police show little interest in solving the crime.(n)

programme.title: Bad Ass 2: Bad Asses
programme.desc: In this buddy drama, a Vietnam vet and his grumpy yet lovable sidekick team up to find the killer of a young boxer and clean up the streets of LA only to be drawn into an international crime ring. Stars Danny Trejo and Danny Glover.(n)

programme.title: Bad Ass 3: Bad Asses on the Bayou
programme.desc: Action film series starring Danny Glover and Danny Trejo as senior heroes who visit Louisiana for a wedding escape only to encounter violence and mayhem, and once again, must pursue their own form of justice.(n)

programme.title: Assault on Precinct 13
programme.desc: Isolated and cut off from the city inside a soon-to-be-closed L.A. police station, a group of police officers and convicts join forces to defend themselves against a gang who wants to kill someone trapped inside the precinct.(n)

programme.title: The Peacemaker
programme.desc: When a train carrying atomic warheads mysteriously crashes in the former Soviet Union, brilliant U.S. nuclear specialist Dr. Julia Kelly (Nicole Kidman) discovers the accident is really part of a diabolical plot to cover up the theft of the weapons. Assigned to help her recover the missing bombs, Special Forces Colonel Thomas Devoe (George Clooney), has a brash, take-no-prisoners style that clashes with Kelly's diplomatic approach. Putting aside their personal differences, the two begin a partnership and try to track down the stolen weapons.(n)

programme.title: Perfect in '76
programme.desc: SHOWTIME documentary revisiting the ‘76 Hoosiers and renowned coach Bobby Knight, who led his Indiana team to a perfect 32-0 season and a national championship.(n)

programme.title: The Game
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Michael Douglas stars as a man who's chosen to participate in a live-action game that penetrates all aspects of his life. But when it begins to go out of control, he tries to escape. Directed by David Fincher.(n)

programme.title: Alive
programme.desc: Stranded after a plane crash in the Andes mountains, individual members of Uruguay's rugby team respond differently. Group leader Nando (Ethan Hawke) tries to keep everyone's spirits up; medical student Roberto (Josh Hamilton) diligently treats cases of frostbite and gangrene; loose cannon Antonio (Vincent Spano) gradually loses his composure. Once all available food runs out, the group faces a terrible dilemma: eat one or more of their deceased teammates, or die.(n)

programme.title: King Arthur
programme.desc: An adventure that tells the true story of Arthur (Clive Owen) and his bond of brotherhood with Lancelot (Ioan Gruffudd) and the Knights Of The Round Table as they fight for freedom and those they love. Co-starring Keira Knightley.(n)

programme.title: Cloverfield
programme.desc: A group of friends venture deep into the streets of New York on a rescue mission during a rampaging monster attack.(n)

programme.title: Major League II
programme.desc: The Indians are now a World Series contender. But last season's hunger is now replaced with complacency and bad decisions by the new owner that threaten to tear the team apart.(n)

programme.title: Man On A Ledge
programme.desc: When former NYPD officer turned prison escapee Nick Cassidy (Sam Worthington) enters the famed Roosevelt Hotel on 45th and Madison in New York City, heads to one of the highest floors and steps out a window onto the ledge, he threatens more than just his own well-being. A whole city is about to seize up, including some very nervous people with some very big secrets. Elizabeth Banks, Ed Harris and Edward Burns co-star in this propulsive, twisty action thriller.(n)

programme.title: The Fantasticks
programme.desc: Joel Grey and Brad Sullivan are small-town fathers conspiring to bring their children together in a love match by pretending to discourage it in this magical musical costarring Barnard Hughes.

programme.title: The Preacher's Wife
programme.desc: Denzel Washington stars as an angel named Dudley sent to Earth to help a minister's marriage (Courtney B. Vance) to his wife (Whitney Houston). Things take a twist when Dudley accidentally falls in love with her.

programme.title: Surviving The Wild
programme.desc: Following the untimely death of his grandpa Gus (Jon Voight), thirteen-year-old Shaun (Aidan Cullen) disregards his parent's wishes and embarks on a journey with his dog Riley, to spread his grandpa's ashes in the wild. Throughout the journey, Shaun is guided by the spirit of his grandfather. Together they overcome challenge after challenge, as Shaun traverses white water rapids and tries to evade two crazed hillbillies that are on his tail.

programme.title: I Am David
programme.desc: A young boy named David (Ben Tibber) flees a Communist prison camp in 1950's Bulgaria and embarks on a remarkable cross-cultural odyssey to deliver a letter to a stranger in Denmark. James Caviezel and Joan Plowright costar in this moving drama based on the novel "North to Freedom" by Anne Holm and directed by Paul Feig of TV's "Freaks and Geeks.".

programme.title: Encino Man
programme.desc: Two high school buddies dig up a frozen caveman in their backyard. Once the living fossil thaws out, the friends realize he's their ticket to being cool. Starring Pauly Shore, Sean Astin and Brendan Fraser.

programme.title: The Host
programme.desc: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over their bodies and erasing their memories, Melanie (Saoirse Ronan) risks everything to protect the people she loves — her friends, her brother and her Uncle Jeb (William Hurt).

programme.title: Are We There Yet?
programme.desc: Nick, a smooth operator, is trying to land a date with Suzanne, a divorcee with whom he would like to ring in the New Year. Problem is, Suzanne is stuck working in Vancouver and miserable because she misses her kids. Seizing the opportunity, Nick gallantly offers to make her New Year's wish come true - and his own in the process - by driving eight-year-old Kevin and eleven-year-old Lindsey up from Portland, Oregon to be reunited with their mom. What Nick doesn't know is that Suzanne's children hate every man their mom dates on sight.

programme.title: The Longshots
programme.desc: A former high school football star gets his self-respect back when he lands a job coaching the local Pop Warner team with his athletically gifted niece as quarterback. Ice Cube stars in this sports comedy with Keke Palmer and Dash Mihok.

programme.title: Becoming Cary Grant
programme.desc: Using words from his unpublished autobiography along with newly-discovered personal footage shot with a film-maker's eye, Cary Grant - one of Hollywood's greatest stars - tells his story himself. Exploring his long journey from childhood poverty to global fame, this radically new perspective of a man on a quest to find the love that eluded him most of his life reveals the man behind the mask of subtle charm and suave sophistication.

programme.title: The Dog Lover
programme.desc: Sara Gold is a young girl on a quest to save man's best friend. When she goes undercover to take down a dog breeder suspected of wrongdoing, she quickly finds out she might be on the wrong side of right. Sara must make a decision: to continue and follow the orders of her organization, United Animal Protection Agency, or trust her instincts and the boy she's fallen in love with.

programme.title: Cupid's Proxy
programme.desc: Rebecca Murphy is a cynical widow whose whole world revolves around her 12 year old son, Justin - a budding musician who can't remember his late father. Rebecca has no desire to date despite efforts by her feisty neighbor, Olive, who has a love advice column called Call Me Cupid. When Olive is pressured by her editor to get with the times, she enlists Justin to help her answer a letter. Unbeknownst to Justin, she publishes his advice under the alter ego, Cupid's Proxy.

programme.title: Middle School: The Worst Years of My Life
programme.desc: Rafe has an epic imagination and a slight problem with authority. When he transfers to a new school, Rafe and his scheming best friend Leo hatch a plan to break every rule in the school's code of conduct. This causes a battle with the principal, which explodes into chaos both real and imagined. Rafe struggles to hide his misbehavior from Jeanne, the straight-A, overachieving girl of his dreams, while at home, his mother's boyfriend - a moochy, jack-of-no-trades named Bear - threatens to become his stepfather.

programme.title: Cairo Time
programme.desc: A diplomat's wife (Patricia Clarkson) stranded in Cairo, Egypt finds herself attracted to an old friend of her husband's who volunteers to guide her around the city during her stay. Alexander Siddig costars with Elena Anaya in this romantic culture clash drama.

programme.title: Shanghai Noon
programme.desc: The Wild West meets the Far East in a battle for honor, royalty and gold when acrobatic Chinese Imperial Guard Chon Wang (Jackie Chan) comes to America to rescue beautiful Princess Pei Pei (Lucy Liu) who has been kidnapped from The Forbidden City. With the help of a partner he doesn't trust (Owen Wilson), a wife he didn't expect (Brandon Merrill), a horse with a personality all its own and martial arts moves no one can believe, Chon finds himself facing the meanest gunslingers in the West.

programme.title: The Longshots
programme.desc: A former high school football star gets his self-respect back when he lands a job coaching the local Pop Warner team with his athletically gifted niece as quarterback. Ice Cube stars in this sports comedy with Keke Palmer and Dash Mihok.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?
programme.desc: Nick, a smooth operator, is trying to land a date with Suzanne, a divorcee with whom he would like to ring in the New Year. Problem is, Suzanne is stuck working in Vancouver and miserable because she misses her kids. Seizing the opportunity, Nick gallantly offers to make her New Year's wish come true - and his own in the process - by driving eight-year-old Kevin and eleven-year-old Lindsey up from Portland, Oregon to be reunited with their mom. What Nick doesn't know is that Suzanne's children hate every man their mom dates on sight.

programme.title: Middle School: The Worst Years of My Life
programme.desc: Rafe has an epic imagination and a slight problem with authority. When he transfers to a new school, Rafe and his scheming best friend Leo hatch a plan to break every rule in the school's code of conduct. This causes a battle with the principal, which explodes into chaos both real and imagined. Rafe struggles to hide his misbehavior from Jeanne, the straight-A, overachieving girl of his dreams, while at home, his mother's boyfriend - a moochy, jack-of-no-trades named Bear - threatens to become his stepfather.

programme.title: Sister
programme.desc: After the death of his father, a young man whose life is falling apart, returns to his hometown to take care of his mentally ill sister, and tries to save her, while also saving himself.

programme.title: Gambler's Ballad: The Legend of Johnny Thompson
programme.desc: This film explores one of the greatest magicians and magic minds in history, Johnny Thompson. He teaches fellow magician Penn Jillette his signature piece called Gambler's Ballad.

programme.title: All-Stars
programme.desc: Comedy about a veteran softball coach, who is saddled with a team of inexperienced 10-year-old girls and their overly ambitious, delusional parents.

programme.title: Dean Smith
programme.desc: Coach, mentor, social activist ...the life and legacy of Dean Smith, North Carolina's legendary basketball coach - who went to 11 Finals Fours and won two National Championships, with players like Michael Jordan, James Worthy, Vince Carter and Jerry Stackhouse - is remembered and celebrated by former players and colleagues.

programme.title: Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius
programme.desc: A ten-year-old genius inventor must rally his neighborhood pals to build an armada of spaceships and rescue their parents from a goopy alien race in time for dinner in this computer-animated box office blockbuster from Nickelodeon. Featuring the voices of Martin Short, Andrea Martin and Patrick Stewart.

programme.title: Jurassic School
programme.desc: Nerdy middle schooler Tommy is forced take care of a baby dinosaur after his cloned science fair project hatches early. He quickly begins to think of the creature not only as a pet, but also as a friend. But when the dinosaur escapes on the day of the fair, Tommy must figure out a way to get the creature back before greedy grown-ups get to him first.

programme.title: Crowning Jules
programme.desc: Jules is a bright and sassy 17 year-old who desperately wants to leave her Midwestern family's alumni traditions behind, but to get to her once-in-a-lifetime Harvard admissions interview, she's forced to hitch a ride with her twin sister/nemesis, Madison, who is headed to a beauty pageant. Their road trip takes a turn when the teenage sisters unwittingly come into possession of a stolen jewel and are pursued by dangerous thieves.

programme.title: Different Flowers
programme.desc: Uptight Millie Haven (Emma Bell) has always followed the rules, but when she has doubts before her big Kansas City wedding, her attitude-prone little sister Emma (Hope Lauren), comes to the rescue. They embark on a spontaneous road trip to their grandmother's farm where, with the help of Grandma Mildred (Shelley Long), they rediscover their bond. They meet a local hunk with a heart of gold, and a host of only-in-the-Midwest characters as they pick up the pieces of Millie's life.

programme.title: Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius
programme.desc: A ten-year-old genius inventor must rally his neighborhood pals to build an armada of spaceships and rescue their parents from a goopy alien race in time for dinner in this computer-animated box office blockbuster from Nickelodeon. Featuring the voices of Martin Short, Andrea Martin and Patrick Stewart.

programme.title: Festival in Cannes
programme.desc: Dazzling Mediterranean vistas frame this wry and acerbic tale of cinema art versus mass-market commerce from Henry Jaglom. A legendary European screen star (Anouk Aimee) becomes the decisive player in a face-off pitting an actress-turned-independent filmmaker (Greta Scacchi) against a high-powered Hollywood producer (Ron Silver), both of whom are trying to put together deals for prospective film projects at the Cannes Film Festival. "A giddy comic fantasy, full of romance, chicanery and beguiling, sophisticated players" - "Los Angeles Times.".

programme.title: The Emperor's New Clothes
programme.desc: An ingenious game of "what if" lies at the heart of this gentle comedy/fantasy directed by Alan Taylor. In this alternative take on history, Napoleon (Ian Holm in a dual role) escapes exile on St. Helena when he and his supporters convince a minor deck-hand to double for him in captivity. The emperor will return to France, the ruse will be revealed, and Napoleon will return to power. Or that's the plan. Alas, it seems captivity has its allures and Bonaparte's doppelganger begins to enjoy his new persona. "Delightful" - "Los Angeles Times.".

programme.title: Skateboarding's First Wave
programme.desc: Documentary from Academy Award® nominee Don Burgess exploring the origins of skateboarding culture, through the lens of the 1965 Palisades Skateboard Team, who reinvented a childhood hobby into a sport, bringing it to the vanguard of popular culture. Features interviews with the team members reflecting on how the sport has changed, 50 years later.

programme.title: A Dog's Purpose
programme.desc: A devoted dog (voiced by Josh Gad) finds the meaning of his own existence through the lives of the humans he teaches to laugh and love. Also starring Dennis Quaid, Britt Robertson, K.J. Apa, Peggy Lipton and Pooch Hall.

programme.title: Clockstoppers
programme.desc: Sci-fi action highlights this breezy fantasy starring Jesse Bradford as Zak Gibbs, a high school student who "borrows" the latest invention of his scientist dad, a "hyper-time" device that impresses a pretty exchange student (Paula Garces) but also attracts the attention of a sinister government agent (Michael Biehn). French Stewart and Julia Sweeney costar in this teen adventure in the tradition of "Back to the Future.".(n)

programme.title: Tron
programme.desc: When a brilliant video game maker named Flynn (Jeff Bridges) hacks the mainframe of his ex-employer, he is beamed inside a digital world and becomes part of the very game he is designing.(n)

programme.title: Push (2009)
programme.desc: A clairvoyant teenager (Dakota Fanning) and a telekinetic fugitive (Chris Evans) team up to find a missing woman who is the key to exposing a sinister, secret government agency that's building a clandestine army of psychic warriors. Djimon Hounsou costars in this sci-fi action thriller.(n)

programme.title: Touchback
programme.desc: Former high school football star turned farmer and family man Scott Murphy (Brian Presley) finds himself with a unique opportunity to revisit the championship game where he permanently injured his knee in a game-winning play. Given a second shot at football fame, Scott seeks counsel from his longtime mentor, Coach Hand (Kurt Russell), to help him decide whether to let his fate unfold or follow a path that will change his future.(n)

programme.title: Who Gets the Dog?
programme.desc: After deciding to call their marriage quits, Olive (Alicia Silverstone) and Clay (Ryan Kwanten) both want custody of their beloved dog Wesley. Facing a court-ordered 60-day review to determine who'll get the pooch, Olive and Clay try their doggone best to win over the judge in this romantic comedy about what happens when puppy love goes to the dogs.(n)

programme.title: Tron
programme.desc: When a brilliant video game maker named Flynn (Jeff Bridges) hacks the mainframe of his ex-employer, he is beamed inside a digital world and becomes part of the very game he is designing.(n)

programme.title: The Hundred-Foot Journey
programme.desc: When a displaced Indian family opens a restaurant in the south of France, just 100 feet from a Michelin star restaurant, a culinary war ensues between the two establishments. Stars Academy Award® winner Helen Mirren.(n)

programme.title: Momma
programme.desc: A nine-year-old boy living in a trailer park carries on with his schoolwork and daily chores petrified at the thought of being taken away from his mother.(n)

programme.title: Dean Smith
programme.desc: Coach, mentor, social activist ...the life and legacy of Dean Smith, North Carolina's legendary basketball coach - who went to 11 Finals Fours and won two National Championships, with players like Michael Jordan, James Worthy, Vince Carter and Jerry Stackhouse - is remembered and celebrated by former players and colleagues.(n)

programme.title: Cupid's Proxy
programme.desc: Rebecca Murphy is a cynical widow whose whole world revolves around her 12 year old son, Justin - a budding musician who can't remember his late father. Rebecca has no desire to date despite efforts by her feisty neighbor, Olive, who has a love advice column called Call Me Cupid. When Olive is pressured by her editor to get with the times, she enlists Justin to help her answer a letter. Unbeknownst to Justin, she publishes his advice under the alter ego, Cupid's Proxy.(n)

programme.title: Christmas Ranch
programme.desc: When a rebellious young girl is sent to stay on her grandmother's ranch for Christmas, a friendship with a pony alters the course of her life but when the ranch is threatened with foreclosure she must come up with a plan to save horse and home.(n)

programme.title: Middle School: The Worst Years of My Life
programme.desc: Rafe has an epic imagination and a slight problem with authority. When he transfers to a new school, Rafe and his scheming best friend Leo hatch a plan to break every rule in the school's code of conduct. This causes a battle with the principal, which explodes into chaos both real and imagined. Rafe struggles to hide his misbehavior from Jeanne, the straight-A, overachieving girl of his dreams, while at home, his mother's boyfriend - a moochy, jack-of-no-trades named Bear - threatens to become his stepfather.(n)

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: Young Babe has no way of knowing how much his world is about to change when his mother is suddenly hauled off in a truck that takes pigs away. Babe then arrives at the farm of Mr. Hoggett and his large and lively wife, Esme. All kinds of species live on the farm, and some of the animals welcome Babe with open paws, while a few resent the friendly little porker. Babe's approach to the barnyard life is different from all the others, and he goes to great lengths to find acceptance.(n)

programme.title: Heartbeats
programme.desc: A feisty American hip hop dancer travels to India with her family for a wedding and falls in love - both with a new style of dance, and with the determined young man who introduces it to her.(n)

programme.title: The Stepford Wives
programme.desc: Nicole Kidman, Matthew Broderick and Christopher Walken star in this satirical remake of the classic thriller about a planned community where the picture-perfect women are a little too eerily flawless. Glenn Close, Bette Midler, Jon Lovitz and Roger Bart costar in this wickedly acerbic comedy from writer Paul Rudnick ("Addams Family Values," "In & Out").(n)

programme.title: Jenny's Wedding
programme.desc: Jenny Farrell has led an openly gay life with everyone except her family. She has kept it a secret out of compassion for her parents, knowing they are happiest living in a small, safe and familiar world. Realizing she is missing out on having a full life, Jenny decides to marry Kitty, a woman they thought was her roommate. Her parents are shocked to find out how little they know their daughter and fear becoming the object of gossip in their small community. Misunderstanding leads to misunderstanding, and long-standing grudges are revealed.

programme.title: I, Daniel Blake
programme.desc: Daniel Blake (Dave Johns) is a man out of time. He's a widowed woodworker who's never owned a computer and lives according to his own common sense moral code. After a heart attack leaves him unable to work and the state welfare system fails him, Daniel must stand up and fight for his dignity and lead a one-man crusade for compassion that transforms the lives of a single mother (Hayley Squires) and her two children.

programme.title: The Girl On The Train
programme.desc: Rachel, who is devastated by her recent divorce, spends her daily commute fantasizing about the seemingly perfect couple who live in a house that her train passes every day. One morning she sees something shocking happen there and becomes entangled in the mystery that unfolds. Emily Blunt, Lisa Kudrow, Justin Theroux and Allison Janney star.

programme.title: Brimstone
programme.desc: Liz (Dakota Fanning) is full of heart and grit but is being hunted by a vengeful Preacher (Guy Pearce) who is a diabolical zealot. She's a genuine survivor and uses her strength to claim the better life she and her daughter deserve.

programme.title: The Funhouse Massacre
programme.desc: On Halloween night, a group of notorious serial killers escape from an asylum and terrorize the patrons of a funhouse carnival - leaving only a rag-tag bunch of kids, a clueless deputy and a local sheriff to stop the carnage.

programme.title: Dudes & Dragons
programme.desc: When a powerful wizard is jilted by a princess, he vows to rid the land of love and commands a fire breathing dragon to destroy any sign of affection seen throughout the kingdom but as the death toll rises, a brave and arrogant warrior and his estranged brother answer the princess’ call to fight the curse.

programme.title: Crowning Jules
programme.desc: Jules is a bright and sassy 17 year-old who desperately wants to leave her Midwestern family's alumni traditions behind, but to get to her once-in-a-lifetime Harvard admissions interview, she's forced to hitch a ride with her twin sister/nemesis, Madison, who is headed to a beauty pageant. Their road trip takes a turn when the teenage sisters unwittingly come into possession of a stolen jewel and are pursued by dangerous thieves.

programme.title: The Art of the Steal
programme.desc: This eye-opening documentary tells the story of the Barnes Collection, $25 billion worth of masterpieces by Cezanne, Matisse and Renoir that has become the focus of a culture war between those who wish to preserve the intentions of the collection's original owner, and a conspiracy of politically powerful corporations seeking to profit by seizing and relocating the artwork.

programme.title: Band Aid
programme.desc: Anna (Zoe Lister-Jones) and Ben (Adam Pally) are a couple who can't stop fighting. Advised by their therapist to try and work through their grief unconventionally, they are reminded of their shared love of music. In a last-ditch effort to save their marriage, they decide to turn all their fights into song, and with the help of their neighbor Dave (Fred Armisen), they start a band.

programme.title: The Purge
programme.desc: Pope Alexander tasks Cardinal Sforza with initiating an inquisition among the Cardinals who were politicking against him. With the evidence he needs, Alexander dismisses and banishes all the Cardinals he does not trust. Meanwhile, Catherina Sforza orders Rufio to seek support from the mercenary warlords of the Romagna families. Lucrezia is annoyed with her in-laws to be and her situation is complicated further as she realizes her feelings for Cesare are becoming something more than sisterly.(c)

credits.director: Adult Content, Graphic Violence, Adult Language, Brief Nudity

programme.title: Siblings
programme.desc: As the purged Cardinals are dismissed and stripped of their titles and wealth, one of them angrily sets the Vatican treasury ablaze. Incensed by the new King Ferdinand's arrogant refusal to accept Giovanni as Lucrezia's child, Cesare travels to Naples to fix the problem. After Lucrezia and Alfonso's wedding, Alfonso realizes that the political sands are shifting - and not in his favor. Upset, he abandons Lucrezia alone on their wedding night, driving her into the arms of someone else.(c)

credits.director: Adult Content, Adult Language, Brief Nudity

programme.title: The Banquet Of Chestnuts
programme.desc: Newly appointed Cardinal Farnese is placed in the Treasury and quickly discovers Versucci's theft. Micheletto is sent to find the wayward Cardinal. Meanwhile, upon hearing of Venice's request for help, Alexander, seeing this as an opportunity to replenish the coffers, dramatically calls for a Crusade. The Cardinals participate in the "banquet of chestnuts". Elsewhere, King Ferdinand learns that Lucrezia and Alfonso's marriage has not been consummated.(c)

credits.director: Adult Content, Adult Language, Nudity, Mild Violence

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: Over-worked, over-committed and exhausted, Amy joins forces with two other stressed moms on a quest to liberate themselves from conventional responsibilities - going on a long overdue binge of freedom and fun that puts them on a collision course with the head of the PTA and her clique of perfect moms.

programme.title: Don't Sleep
programme.desc: Shawn and Zach are young lovers who move into a guesthouse together on an estate owned by Mr. and Mrs. Marino. When bizarre events begin to occur, Zach slowly remembers a forgotten time in his childhood when he suffered from severe and violent psychosis - memories erased by a series of electroconvulsive shock treatments administered by his psychiatrist. As the terrors surrounding their lives grow to deadly proportions, Zach is forced to question his own sanity.

programme.title: Shot
programme.desc: Three lives are irrevocably changed when a gun is accidentally fired on a busy LA street. Mark (Noah Wyle) and Phoebe (Sharon Leal) are in the midst of a breakup. Miguel (Jorge Lendeborg, Jr.), a bullied teenager, is given an illegal gun by his cousin for protection. As Miguel handles it, the gun accidently fires and Mark is hit by the bullet.

programme.title: This Isn't Funny
programme.desc: Eliot is a stand up comedian with crippling anxiety, while Jamie avoids life through partying and travel. When Jamie rides his bike into Eliot's car their exchange is not exactly pleasant. Eliot then riffs on their encounter in her set that night and Jamie is there to see it. Suddenly the chemistry is undeniable. Just as they open themselves up and see they might be a fit, new job opportunities and family crises strain their relationship.

programme.title: Band Aid
programme.desc: Anna (Zoe Lister-Jones) and Ben (Adam Pally) are a couple who can't stop fighting. Advised by their therapist to try and work through their grief unconventionally, they are reminded of their shared love of music. In a last-ditch effort to save their marriage, they decide to turn all their fights into song, and with the help of their neighbor Dave (Fred Armisen), they start a band.

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: Over-worked, over-committed and exhausted, Amy joins forces with two other stressed moms on a quest to liberate themselves from conventional responsibilities - going on a long overdue binge of freedom and fun that puts them on a collision course with the head of the PTA and her clique of perfect moms.

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero
programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of today's finest stand-ups, including Baron Vaughn, Andrew Santino, Emily Heller, James Adomian and Moshe Kasher along with some glamorous sneak peeks of the SXSW festival in Austin, Texas.

programme.title: Stolen
programme.desc: Haunted by the kidnapping and murder of his ten-year-old son, a grieving detective (Jon Hamm) seeks redemption when he investigates a fifty-year-old murder case with eerie similarities to his story. Josh Lucas and James Van Der Beek costar in this mystery thriller.

programme.title: Shot
programme.desc: Three lives are irrevocably changed when a gun is accidentally fired on a busy LA street. Mark (Noah Wyle) and Phoebe (Sharon Leal) are in the midst of a breakup. Miguel (Jorge Lendeborg, Jr.), a bullied teenager, is given an illegal gun by his cousin for protection. As Miguel handles it, the gun accidently fires and Mark is hit by the bullet.

programme.title: The Harvest
programme.desc: A couple who keeps their sick son in a secluded environment find their controlled lives challenged by a young girl who moves in next door. The perfect family is not who they appear to be. Starring Michael Shannon.

programme.title: The Preacher's Wife
programme.desc: Denzel Washington stars as an angel named Dudley sent to Earth to help a minister's marriage (Courtney B. Vance) to his wife (Whitney Houston). Things take a twist when Dudley accidentally falls in love with her.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason
programme.desc: Just when Bridget thinks life is perfect, her relationship with the dreamy Mark Darcy implodes. She sets off on a whirlwind business trip to Thailand where she encounters old flame Daniel Cleaver, and her life gets out-of-control.

programme.title: The Wolf And The Lamb
programme.desc: Cesare's diplomatic mission to France is a success, with the help of his old advisor Machiavelli. Back in Rome, the seductive and dangerously insane Bianca makes a drastic statement. Lucrezia travels to Naples accompanied by her husband and Micheletto. King Ferdinand remains steadfast in his determination that little Giovanni will not be recognized at court. Upon learning this, Lucrezia plots against him.(c)

credits.director: Adult Content, Adult Language, Violence, Brief Nudity

programme.title: Relics
programme.desc: When Cesare lands in northern Italy with a French army, Alexander is furious at what he sees as a challenge to his authority, but reluctantly accedes to Cesare's plan to destroy the Sforza dynasty. Catherina, meanwhile, has come up with a plot of her own: biological warfare. Concerned about the lack of funds for his Crusade, Alexander imposes punitive taxes on the newly arrived Jewish community.(c)

programme.title: Lucrezia's Gambit
programme.desc: Cesare burns Constanzo's palace in order to contain the plague. Lucrezia, aware that the political wind has changed towards France, seeks a Neapolitan power base for herself and her family. Lucrezia blackmails Prince Raphael and Prince Frederigo replaces Ferdinand as King.(c)

programme.title: Mercy (2010)
programme.desc: A writer (Scott Caan) of highly sentimental love stories is secretly a womanizing cynic who has never actually experienced love, until he meets the beautiful and shockingly straightforward critic Mercy (Wendy Glenn), who is not fooled by his phony mawkishness. Erika Christensen costars in this romantic drama.

programme.title: Comet
programme.desc: Justin Long and Emmy Rossum are star-crossed lovers in an alternate universe, whose relationship blooms and unravels over the course of six years. A chance encounter brings them together, and the story zigzags back and forth in time—from a meteor shower in LA, to an encounter in a Paris hotel room, to a fateful phone call— resulting in a portrait of the relationship between the cynical Dell (Long) and the quick-witted Kimberly (Rossum).

programme.title: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason
programme.desc: Just when Bridget thinks life is perfect, her relationship with the dreamy Mark Darcy implodes. She sets off on a whirlwind business trip to Thailand where she encounters old flame Daniel Cleaver, and her life gets out-of-control.

programme.title: The Preacher's Wife
programme.desc: Denzel Washington stars as an angel named Dudley sent to Earth to help a minister's marriage (Courtney B. Vance) to his wife (Whitney Houston). Things take a twist when Dudley accidentally falls in love with her.(n)

programme.title: Whitney. "Can I Be Me"
programme.desc: Directors Nick Broomfield and Rudi Dolezal weave never before seen video, candid interviews and behind the scenes performance footage into a raw and uncensored portrait of Whitney Houston, who died suddenly at age 48 after years of struggling with addiction. Exploring her far-reaching impact, the directors focus on Houston's central dilemma: even though she had made millions of dollars and was recognized as having one of the greatest voices of all time, she still couldn't do what she wanted, either professionally or in her personal life.(n)

programme.title: Winter Passing
programme.desc: In this dramatic comedy, Zooey Deschanel stars as a struggling twenty-something actress who goes in search of her legendary, reclusive novelist father and must wrestle with his unconventional new family and their shared past. Also stars Ed Harris and Will Ferrell.(n)

programme.title: Beyond the Opposite Sex
programme.desc: This documentary picks up the respective stories of Rene and Jamie, 13 years after their Gender Affirmation Surgeries. The two subjects let us back into their very changed worlds and find that their surgeries, which had been lifelong goals, were far from the finish line of their journeys - in fact, they turned out to be only the beginning of more difficult, arduous and true lifelong experiences.(n)

programme.title: Boogie Woogie
programme.desc: The over-hyped, pretentious modern art scene in London is satirized in this dark ensemble comedy about the double dealings and calculated relationships encircling the effort to get an aging collector to part with a valuable painting. Gillian Anderson, Alan Cumming and Heather Graham star.(n)

programme.title: Personal Shopper
programme.desc: By day, American in Paris Maureen (Kristen Stewart) works as a personal shopper, motor-biking around the city buying up deluxe couture for a celebrity client. By night, she attempts to channel the spirits of the dead, hoping to make contact with her recently deceased twin brother. When Maureen begins receiving a series of chilling, increasingly sinister text messages, it seems she may have made contact - but she doesn't know with whom.(n)

programme.title: Cairo Time

A plot to deceive the Borgia family is uncovered by Lucrezia, Cesare and Micheletto.(n)

Alexander schemes to corner the market in Italian sulfur - the key ingredient to gunpowder.(n)

Following a scuffle with Cesare, a drunken Alfonso is near death and Lucrezia turns to her potions to end his life painlessly. Cesare vows that Lucrezia will now be his for good.(n)

Her parents are shocked to find out how little they know their daughter and fear becoming the object of gossip in their small community. programme.desc: Olympic swimmer Michael Phelps takes on some of the show's most memorable past champions - singer-songwriter John Legend, NFL star-turned-actor Terry Crews and actress and model Olivia Munn. Phelps launches into Eminem's Lose Yourself, recreating the rapper's 8 Mile anthem, Crews performs an energetic take on Public Enemy's Fight the Power, Munn offers a circus-inspired performance of Cheap Thrills by Sia, while Legend transforms his appearance for the Outkast hit Hey Ya!, with Stevie Wonder on keyboards. Presented by LL Cool J, with commentary by Chrissy Teigen.(n)

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.

programme.title: Zranione uczucia

programme.title: Mistrzowskie Szybkie strzały
programme.desc: Specjalne, mundialowe wydanie programu "Szybkie strzały". Twórcy przeprowadzają nietypową sondę uliczną. Prowadzący zadają napotkanym osobom oryginalne, często wręcz abstrakcyjne pytania. Nieraz potrafią nimi swoich rozmówców mocno zaskoczyć.

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości.(n)

programme.desc: Specjalne, mundialowe wydanie programu "Szybkie strzały". Twórcy przeprowadzają nietypową sondę uliczną. Prowadzący zadają napotkanym osobom oryginalne, często wręcz abstrakcyjne pytania. Nieraz potrafią nimi swoich rozmówców mocno zaskoczyć.(n)

programme.title: 10 hitów 1 po 2
programme.desc: Twórcy programu w każdym wydaniu prezentują 10 wybranych hitów. Utwory, będące największymi przebojami najsłynniejszych wykonawców, grane są jeden po drugim.(n)

programme.title: Projekt Kamper
programme.desc: Twórcy programu prezentują widzom 50 rzeczy, które każdy powinien zrobić podczas wakacji. Na liście nie powinno zabraknąć takich punktów, jak zjedzenie gofra, czy rozstawienie parawanu.(n)

By contrast, George, another of Wayne's class mates might just be year 7's 'Mr Perfect'. Can Wayne learn from George's example and channel his energy in the right direction?(n)

programme.title: All Over the Workplace
programme.desc: Freya sees herself as a full-time professional footballer and Chitua wants to be a player before progressing to manager. They visit a professional football club where they are put through their paces by the coaches, then meet the manager to find out all about formations and tactics. Presented by Alex Riley.(n)

programme.title: Hetty Feather
programme.desc: There's an explosive finale at Emily's 16th birthday party when Hetty fights to reunite Rosamund with her long lost son, while Lady Grenford will stop at nothing to force Emily and Robert's engagement.(n)

programme.title: Puss in Boots: The Three Diablos
programme.desc: Animated short featuring the lovable cat from the hit film series Shrek. Puss in Boots helps three kittens rescue a precious ruby from the evil Whisperer. Featuring the voices of Antonio Banderas, Gilles Marini and Charlotte Newhouse.(n)

programme.title: Arthur
programme.desc: Maria finally speaks in Mr Ratburn's third-grade class and it turns out she has a stutter.(n)

programme.title: OOglies Funsize

programme.title: Danger Mouse

programme.desc: Mitchell becomes the prime suspect when various items disappear from around Strange Hill High, including Templeton's pants, so he enlists the help of his friends to clear his name. The group soon discovers the treasures of the school's Lost and Found room.(n)

programme.title: Gym Stars
programme.desc: To pursue her dream of becoming a world-class gymnast Amelie and her family have had to make loads of sacrifices - the biggest being the decision for Amelie and her mum to live away from her twin brother and father. However, Amelie has a weekend off training and cannot wait to spend quality time with her mum, dad, brother and dog. Meanwhile, the Acrobatic gymnasts have a very important competition - the British Championships, where both teams will be facing tough competition and a chance to win a place at the World Championships in Belgium.(n)

programme.title: The Next Step
programme.desc: TNS records a Regionals qualifier video. With the deadline imminent, everything must go according to plan. programme.title: Officially Amazing

programme.desc: Alastair and John Moffatt take each other on in a bid for glory, Australian pro-skater Nikki Rose Quinlan takes on a challenge and Mr Cherry attempts to move egg yolks with chopsticks in world record time. Plus, competitive team domino toppling and two teams from China take on a skipping challenge - while in a human pyramid.(n)

programme.title: Shark Bites
